nodes.text: The H'ratth system was a star system located in the Inner Rim. It contained the planet H'ratth.

The Essential Atlas, a reference book published in 2009, placed the H'ratth system in the Colonies region of the galaxy. However, the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, published on the official Star Wars website after the release of the Atlas, located the system (and consequently the planet) in the Inner Rim.
